## implementsComponentInterface() function

Check if a class implements the IComponent interface.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function implementsComponentInterface(cls: any): cls is IComponent;
```

**Returns:**

cls is [IComponent](./koatty_core.icomponent.md)
